comment: I strongly support this new policy as it will improve transparency in government operations. This is exactly what we need to restore public trust.
The proposed changes are concerning and may have unintended consequences. I suggest more consultation before implementation.
This legislation is excellent and addresses key issues we've been facing. I appreciate the government's effort to tackle corruption.
I have mixed feelings about this proposal. While some aspects are good others need more work especially the enforcement mechanisms.
Absolutely disagree with this approach. It will create more bureaucracy and slow down processes that are already inefficient.
Great initiative! This will definitely help small businesses and entrepreneurs. Looking forward to the implementation.
The draft needs significant amendments. Current form may violate constitutional principles and individual rights.
Fully support this bill. It's about time we had proper regulations in this area. The benefits clearly outweigh any concerns.
This policy lacks clarity and specificity. How exactly will it be implemented? More details are needed before approval.
I'm neutral on this matter but appreciate the opportunity to provide feedback. The consultation process itself is commendable.
